statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ 10 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 21 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ 29 \\ 16 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
